game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.beginning: In a world where time is broken, fragments of eternity are scattered throughout the land. Players take on the role of a temporal archaeologist tasked with collecting and restoring these echoes.
game.ending: With the echoes reunited, players can see the entirety of human history unfold before their eyes, revealing the truth behind the cataclysmic event that shattered time itself. The player's ultimate goal is to use this knowledge to prevent the impending doom from occurring.
game.synopsis: Players navigate a sprawling, dynamic world where they'll encounter historical figures, mythical creatures, and other temporal anomalies. As they progress through the game, they'll uncover clues about the nature of time and their own connection to it. By piecing together these fragments, players will unravel a complex narrative that spans centuries, civilizations, and even dimensions.
